# libfuzzerr

<!-- badges: start -->
[![Travis build status](https://travis-ci.org/mpadge/libfuzzerr?branch=master)](https://travis-ci.org/mpadge/libfuzzerr)
[![Project Status: Concept](https://www.repostatus.org/badges/latest/concept.svg)](https://www.repostatus.org/#concept)
<!-- badges: end -->

Experiments in using [llvm's LibFuzzer](https://llvm.org/docs/LibFuzzer.html) on
the `src` code of an R package, with insprition duly taken from google's 
[tutorial on
LibFuzzer](https://github.com/google/fuzzing/blob/master/tutorial/libFuzzerTutorial.md).
This generally requires the latest version of
[`libclang++`](http://releases.llvm.org/9.0.0/tools/clang/docs/ReleaseNotes.html),
and so is probably best all done within some kind of container.
